item.title: Create a horizontal scroll section with HTML,CSS and JS
item.description: Horizontal Section A horizontal section is a section which spreads left to right. It is very elegant and takes less space and can show more data. Making a horizontal section Create three files, index.html, index.css and index.js. Name theme to your liking. Just be sure to link them properly in the index.html file. Then open the index.html file in your favorite code editor. Add the following code to the index.html file:
